item.description:
Every year Sharon puts on some spectacular fireworks on the 3rd. The same company that does the Esplanade does Sharon's. I live 5 houses from the fireworks and would love if you would join me. You can either walk down to the rotary with your chair (BRING A CHAIR) or watch from my yard. You do not have to go onto the sand to see the fireworks as they are visable from the street down by the lake.

Please bring an appetizer or a dessert. Please check to see what others are bringing so we don't have too many duplicates. I will have some soda but if you want wine or beer or some other libation, bring it and bring to share. I have invited others who are not part of our group so I need to limit this to the first 20 who reply. Please, also let me know what you are bringing and please bring it. We will be counting on you.

Parking is across the street at the high school. If the police stop you, say you are going to 184 for a party. If the cop says you can't, he is kidding.

Look forward to seeing you.
item.name: Watch the Fireworks on July 3rd (Tuesday night)
